properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM SNUM FROM (SELECT NOTICE_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, NOTICE_TITLE, COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') CREATE_DATE FROM TB_NOTICE JOIN TB_CATEGORY ON(NOTICE_CATEGORY = CATEGORY_NO) WHERE TB_NOTICE.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE SNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT NOTICE_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, NOTICE_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') CREATE_DATE, COUNT, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_CONTENT FROM TB_NOTICE JOIN TB_CATEGORY ON (NOTICE_CATEGORY = CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (MEMBER_NO = NOTICE_WRITER) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND TB_NOTICE.STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, NOTICE_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICENO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, ? )
UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET NOTICE_CATEGORY = ?, NOTICE_TITLE = ?, NOTICE_CONTENT = ? WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
